name: Please Stand By -I Got Something To Say 130
description: Please Stand By utilizes the iconic SMPTE color bars template and changes the palette to bring into question viewers perceptions surrounding "standards of color." An offshoot of my original series, I Got Something To Say, adds an additional more literal message. Please Stand By, Solving The Wordle. The puzzle craze has taken over the world in 2022, but enjoy it while you can because after being bought out by the NY Times it will almost definitely be behind a paywall in the not so distant future.
